author: Hannah Ryan
title: As Refugees Fight To Leave Papua New Guinea, One Man Is Fighting To Stay
description: After Helal "Spicy" Uddin was deported from Papua New Guinea, he got a boat right back to find his wife and son. View Entire Post ›
content:
Social distancing is pretty much impossible for Helal Uddin.
The Bangladeshi man whose nickname Spicy is a nod to his training as a chef shares a prison room with 50 other men, one of whom has tuberculosis. The room is full of bunk beds (without mattresses),… [+5160 chars]
